ai.summary: A 7 km moderate circular route called Jubilee Walkway (Jubilee Loop) that blends urban streets with park paths for a varied UK walking experience.
ai.terrain_summary: The route uses a mix of surfaces: pavement, park trails, and occasional gravel or grass sections. Expect gentle gradients and some stairs in park areas, with busier urban stretches that may require careful footing.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for urban walking: check weather and daylight, stay aware of traffic at crossings, and keep to designated paths. Be mindful of crowds, especially in city sections. Carry water, wear appropriate footwear, and have a basic first aid kit and a charged phone for emergencies.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to Autumn (roughly March to October)

seo.title: Jubilee Walkway (Jubilee Loop) – 7 km Moderate Urban Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Plan a 7 km moderate urban hike on the Jubilee Walkway (Jubilee Loop). This route weaves city streets with park paths for a varied walking experience across the UK.
